常规水平实线、虚线分割。.en-us: Regular horizontal solid and dashed line.

内嵌文字内容，并控制对齐方式。.en-us: Inner text content and control alignment.

用竖直分割线水平排布若干元素。.en-us: Layout elements horizontally with a vertical line.

通过参数`plain`控制内嵌文字是否呈现正文形式。.en-us: By setting the parameter `plain` control whether to display plain text.

针对水平分割线，可通过参数`size`控制间距大小。.en-us: For horizontal lines, you can control the spacing size through the parameter `size`.
